posts.html:
Classic Avocado Toast

Ingredients:

  • 2 slices of whole grain bread
  • 1 ripe avocado
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Optional: red pepper flakes, lemon juice

How to make:

  1. Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
  2. Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh.
  3. Mash the avocado in a bowl with a fork.
  4. Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
  5. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
  6. Add optional toppings if desired.

Microwave Scrambled Eggs

Ingredients:

  • 2 eggs
  • 2 tablespoons milk
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Optional: grated cheese, chopped herbs

How to make:

  1. Crack the eggs into a microwave-safe bowl.
  2. Add milk, salt, and pepper. Whisk well.
  3. Microwave on high for 45 seconds.
  4. Remove and stir the eggs.
  5. Microwave for another 30-45 seconds until eggs are set.
  6. Add optional cheese or herbs if desired.
  7. Stir and serve.
posts.plaintext:
Classic Avocado Toast

Ingredients:

 * 2 slices of whole grain bread
 * 1 ripe avocado
 * Salt and pepper to taste
 * Optional: red pepper flakes, lemon juice

How to make:

 1. Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
 2. Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop out the flesh.
 3. Mash the avocado in a bowl with a fork.
 4. Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
 5. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
 6. Add optional toppings if desired.

Microwave Scrambled Eggs

Ingredients:

 * 2 eggs
 * 2 tablespoons milk
 * Salt and pepper to taste
 * Optional: grated cheese, chopped herbs

How to make:

 1. Crack the eggs into a microwave-safe bowl.
 2. Add milk, salt, and pepper. Whisk well.
 3. Microwave on high for 45 seconds.
 4. Remove and stir the eggs.
 5. Microwave for another 30-45 seconds until eggs are set.
 6. Add optional cheese or herbs if desired.
 7. Stir and serve.

posts.html:
Classic Cheesecake

Ingredients :

  • 2 cups (200g) graham cracker crumbs
  • 1/2 cup (115g) unsalted butter, melted
  • 1/4 cup (50g) granulated sugar
  • 4 packages (8 oz each) cream cheese, softened
  • 1 cup (200g) granulated sugar
  • 1 tsp vanilla extract
  • 4 large eggs
  • 1 cup (240ml) sour cream
  • 1/2 cup (120ml) heavy cream

How to make :

  1. Preheat oven to 325°F (163°C).
  2. Mix graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and 1/4 cup sugar; press firmly into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan.
  3. Beat cream cheese, 1 cup sugar, and vanilla with a mixer until well blended.
  4. Add eggs, one at a time, mixing on low speed after each just until blended.
  5. Stir in sour cream and heavy cream until smooth.
  6. Pour the mixture over the crust.
  7. Bake for 55-60 minutes or until the center is almost set.
  8. Run a knife around the rim of the pan to loosen the cake; cool before removing the rim.
  9. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

Lemon Bars

Ingredients

  • 1 cup (230g) unsalted butter, softened
  • 1/2 cup (100g) granulated sugar
  • 2 cups (240g) all-purpose flour
  • 4 large eggs
  • 1 1/2 cups (300g) granulated sugar
  • 1/4 cup (30g) all-purpose flour
  • 2/3 cup (160ml) fresh lemon juice
  • Powdered sugar, for dusting

How to make :

  1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
  2. In a medium bowl, blend together softened butter, 1/2 cup sugar, and 2 cups flour.
  3. Press the mixture into the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch pan.
  4. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until firm and golden.
  5. In another bowl, whisk together the remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar and 1/4 cup flour.
  6. Whisk in the eggs and lemon juice.
  7. Pour the lemon mixture over the baked crust.
  8. Bake for an additional 20 minutes.
  9. Allow to cool, then dust with powdered sugar before cutting into squares.

 6. Whisk in the eggs and lemon juice.
 7. Pour the lemon mixture over the baked crust.
 8. Bake for an additional 20 minutes.
 9. Allow to cool, then dust with powdered sugar before cutting into squares.

posts.html:
Grilled Chicken Salad

Ingredients :

  • 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 1 tbsp olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 6 cups mixed greens (lettuce, spinach, arugula)
  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
  • 1 cucumber, sliced
  • 1/2 red onion, thinly sliced
  • 1 avocado, sliced
  • 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled
  • Balsamic vinaigrette dressing

How to make :

  1. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
  2. Rub the chicken breasts with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
  3. Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side or until fully cooked. Let it rest before slicing.
  4. In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and avocado.
  5. Top with sliced grilled chicken and feta cheese.
  6. Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette before serving.

Veggie Wrap

Ingredients :

  • 1 large whole wheat tortilla
  • 2 tbsp hummus
  • 1/2 cup spinach leaves
  • 1/4 cup shredded carrots
  • 1/4 cup sliced bell peppers (red, yellow, or green)
  • 1/4 cup cucumber, sliced
  • 1/4 avocado, sliced
  • 1 tbsp feta cheese, crumbled

How to make :

  1. Lay the tortilla flat and spread hummus evenly over it.
  2. Layer spinach leaves, shredded carrots, sliced bell peppers, cucumber, avocado, and feta cheese on top.
  3. Roll up the tortilla tightly, tucking in the sides as you go.
  4. Slice the wrap in half and serve immediately or wrap in foil for later.

posts.html:
Spaghetti Aglio e Olio

Ingredients :

  • 12 oz (340g) spaghetti
  • 1/2 cup (120ml) extra virgin olive oil
  • 6 cloves garlic, thinly sliced
  • 1/4 tsp red pepper flakes
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
  • Grated Parmesan cheese (optional)

How to make :

  1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain the rest.
  2. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
  3. Add the garlic and red pepper flakes, cooking until the garlic is golden brown and fragrant, about 2 minutes.
  4. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet, tossing to coat in the garlic oil.
  5. Add reserved pasta water a little at a time to achieve the desired consistency.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
  7. Remove from heat and stir in fresh parsley.
  8. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.

Chicken Stir-Fry

Ingredients :

  • 1 lb (450g) boneless, skinless chicken breasts, thinly sliced
  • 2 tbsp vegetable oil
  • 1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced
  • 1 yellow bell pepper, thinly sliced
  • 1 cup broccoli florets
  • 2 garlic cloves, minced
  • 1/4 cup soy sauce
  • 2 tbsp honey
  • 1 tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 tbsp water
  • Cooked white rice, for serving

How to make :

  1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
  2. Add the sliced chicken and cook until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove and set aside.
  3. In the same skillet, add bell peppers, broccoli, and garlic. Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
  4. Return the cooked chicken to the skillet.
  5. In a small bowl, mix soy sauce and honey. Pour over the chicken and vegetables.
  6. Add the cornstarch mixture and cook until the sauce has thickened, about 1-2 minutes.
  7. Serve over cooked white rice.

posts.html:
Caprese Skewers

Ingredients

  • 1 pint cherry tomatoes
  • 1 lb (450g) fresh mozzarella balls (bocconcini)
  • Fresh basil leaves
  • 2 tbsp balsamic glaze
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Toothpicks or small skewers

How to make :

  1. Thread one cherry tomato, one mozzarella ball, and one basil leaf onto each toothpick or skewer.
  2. Arrange skewers on a serving platter.
  3. Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
  4. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
  5. Serve immediately.

Bruschetta

Ingredients :

  • 1 baguette, sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
  • 3 ripe tomatoes, diced
  • 1/4 cup fresh basil, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil
  • 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese (optional)

How to make :

  1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
  2. Arrange baguette slices on a baking sheet and toast in the oven for 5-7 minutes or until golden brown.
  3. In a medium bowl, combine diced tomatoes, chopped basil, minced garlic, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.
  4. Spoon the tomato mixture onto the toasted baguette slices.
  5. Sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese, if desired.

posts.html:
Caesar Salad

Ingredients :

  • 4 cups chopped romaine lettuce
  • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1 cup croutons
  • 1/4 cup Caesar dressing
  • 1/2 lemon, juiced
  • Freshly ground black pepper

How to make :

  1. In a large bowl, combine romaine lettuce and Parmesan cheese.
  2. Add Caesar dressing and lemon juice, tossing to coat evenly.
  3. Top with croutons and freshly ground black pepper.
